scripts.script: Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: OnServiceLoad");
js_initTEST(Session.g_oTEST);
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: Main");
js_enable_event();
js_disable_event();
Session.g_nCurrentState = Session.s_nSTATE_END_CALL;
Server.logInfo("**** BEFORE PUT CALLER ON HOLD ****"); Session.g_dlgCallLeg.LogInfo();
Session.g_bHearbeatTimerFlag = true;
Session.g_strTerminationDigit = "";
js_disable_event();
js_enable_event();
Session.g_strPassword = "";
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: SendLogInCSRIVR");
Session.f_bTryAgain = false;
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: SendLogOutCSRIVR"); Session.g_bGotCSRBeginAssignment = false;
Session.g_bSubscriberConference = true;
js_enable_event();
Session.g_strConferencePasscode = Session.strConfPasscode; Session.g_bSubscriberConference = true;
Server.logInfo("ADD CSR INTO SUBSCRIBER CONFERENCE, SET MUTE FLAG TO TRUE");
Session.f_sCounter++; Session.g_strRetryFlag = "T";
Session.g_strConfResource = Session.g_cnfMain.name;
Session.cnfHack = Session.g_epTemp; Session.cnfHack.name = Session.g_cnfTemp.name;
Session.cnfHack = Session.g_epMain; Session.cnfHack.name = Session.g_cnfMain.name;
Server.logInfo("WAITING FOR CONFERENCE RESPONSE FROM MANAGER SESSION: " + Session.g_strConfManagerSessionId);
Server.logInfo("SENDING SET CONFERENCE MANAGING SESSION ID TO CC");
Server.logInfo("WAITING FOR CC RESPONSE TO SET CONFERENCE MANAGING SESSION ID REQUEST");
Server.logInfo("CALLING CONF INITIALIZER");
Session.g_bSubscriberConference = true; Server.logInfo("g_epTemp.state IS: " + Session.g_epTemp.state);
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: OnEndSession"); js_disable_event();
js_enable_event();
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: OnLogoutCSRGUINotify"); js_disable_event();
Session.g_nTerminationReason = 27;
js_enable_event();
Session.g_nTerminationReason = 27;
Session.g_bCSRMicOn = false; js_enable_event();
js_enable_event();
Session.nReturnCode = 0; Session.strReturnMsg = "";
Server.logError("END ASSIGNMENT, FAIL TO SEND BY TO CSR");
Server.logError("END ASSIGNMENT, FAIL TO PUT CSR ON HOLD");
Session.nReturnCode = 0; Session.strReturnMsg = "";
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: PlayErrorMsg");
js_enable_event();

text-object.text: g_strConfMSNameFromDB (media server name) and g_strConfResource (endpoint name) make it unique

scripts.script: Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: DisconnectFromConference");
Server.logInfo("SENDING DELETE CONFERENCE REQUEST TO MANAGER"); Session.g_cnfMain.LogDebug();
Server.logInfo("WAITING FOR CONFERENCE RESPONSE FROM MANAGER SESSION: " + Session.g_strConfManagerSessionId);
Server.logInfo("SENDING DELETE CONFERENCE REQUEST TO MANAGER"); Session.g_cnfSub.LogDebug();
Server.logInfo("WAITING FOR CONFERENCE RESPONSE FROM MANAGER SESSION: " + Session.g_strConfManagerSessionId);
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: psAPISceSetConfResource"); Server.logInfo("INFO: *********JAVA CALLING SetConfResource *********");
Server.logError("ERROR: FAIL TO SET CONFERENCE RESOURCE");
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: WaitForModerator");
Session.g_bHoldTimerFlag = true;
Session.g_bSentConfJoinEvent = true;
Session.g_lPartyJoinTime = Server.getUTCTime();
js_enable_event();
Server.logInfo("SENDING HEART BEAT REQUEST TO ACD CONTROLLER");
Session.g_nErrorMsgNumber = 5006;
Session.nPromptNumber = 930; //conference has exceed maximum call time
Server.logInfo("PLAY exceeded the maximum call time IN MAIN CONFERENCE");
Server.logInfo("PLAY exceeded the maximum call time IN MAIN CONFERENCE");
Server.logInfo("PLAY exceeded the maximum call time IN MAIN CONFERENCE");
Session.g_lMSConnectTime = Server.getUTCTime();

text-object.text: Since we allow CSR be the first caller to enter conference without moderator even conference required moderator, we do nothing here

scripts.script: Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: StopTimer");
Session.g_bHoldTimerFlag = false;
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: OnLoginCSRGUINotify"); js_disable_event();
Session.g_nCurrentState = Session.s_nSTATE_WAIT_ASSIGNMENT;
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: OnPing");
js_disable_event();
Session.g_bOutDialCSR = true; js_enable_event();
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: OnCSRUnavailable");
js_enable_event();
Session.g_strReturnMsg = "Dialout CSR canceled";
Server.logInfo("OUTDIAL CSR: CALLER HUNG UP");
//work around Cisco2, it added the tag to the To field in the non final response Session.g_dlgCallLeg.dialog.to = js_strip_tag(Session.g_dlgCallLeg.dialog.to);
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: OnBeginCSRConsultNotify");
Server.logInfo("**** Success After Change Coaching Mode ****");
Session.f_strResultMessage = "MediaServer causing coaching mode error";
Session.cnfHack = Session.g_epMain; Session.cnfHack.name = Session.g_cnfMain.name;
js_enable_event();
Session.strEndPointAndMSName = Session.g_cnfTemp.name + "@" + Session.g_cnfTemp.media_server_name;
Session.g_bBeginPrivateTalk = true;
// need to set ms type again because delete will clear out the cnf object Session.g_cnfTemp.media_server_type = Session.s_strConfMSType;

text-object.text: save CC ip and port, conferenceId, passcode. Need to notify CC if CSR hangup

scripts.script: js_disable_event(); Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: OnCSREndPrivateTalk");
Session.g_bCSRMicOn = false; js_enable_event();
Session.strReturnMsg = "ERROR remove memeber from conference";
Session.strReturnMsg = "SUCCESS";
// need to set ms type again because delete will clear out the cnf object Session.g_cnfTemp.media_server_type = Session.s_strConfMSType;
Session.g_bBeginPrivateTalk = false;
Session.g_strReturnMsg = "NOT FIRST PARTICIPANT, BUT THERE IS NO ENDPOINT";
js_enable_event();
Session.g_strReturnMsg = "UNABLE TO ADD PARTICIPANT INTO SUB CONFERENCE";
Session.g_strReturnMsg = "UNABLE TO ADD PARTICIPANT INTO SUB CONFERENCE, CALLER HUNG UP";
Session.g_strReturnMsg = "CSR SHOULD NOT BE IN SUB CONF WITH MUTED OR HOLD";
Server.logInfo("SENDING DELETE CONFERENCE REQUEST TO MANAGER"); Session.g_cnfSub.LogDebug();
Server.logInfo("WAITING FOR CONFERENCE RESPONSE FROM MANAGER SESSION: " + Session.g_strConfManagerSessionId);
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: OnConfRemoveSubConfRequest");
js_enable_event();
Session.g_strReturnMsg = "FAIL TO MOVE PARTICIPANT FROM SUB INTO MAIN CONFERENCE";
Session.g_strReturnMsg = "FAIL TO MOVE PARTICIPANT FROM SUB INTO MAIN CONFERENCE";
js_enable_event();
Session.g_strReturnMsg = "NOT CURRENTLY IN SUB CONFERENCE, CAN'T MOVE TO MAIN CONFERENCE";
Server.logInfo("SENDING DELETE CONFERENCE REQUEST TO MANAGER"); Session.g_cnfSub.LogDebug();
Server.logInfo("WAITING FOR CONFERENCE RESPONSE FROM MANAGER SESSION: " + Session.g_strConfManagerSessionId);
js_disable_event(); Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: OnCSRMicOffRequest");
Session.strReturnMsg = "FAIL TO MODIFY CONFERENCE MEMBER TO MUTED";
js_enable_event();
Session.strReturnMsg = "SUCCESS TO MODIFY CONFERENCE MEMBER TO MUTED"; Session.g_bCSRMicOn = false;
js_disable_event(); Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: OnCSRMicOnRequest");
Session.strReturnMsg = "FAIL TO MODIFY CONFERENCE MEMBER TO UNMUTED";
js_enable_event();
Session.strReturnMsg = "SUCCESS TO MODIFY CONFERENCE MEMBER TO UNMUTED"; Session.g_bCSRMicOn = true;
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: ConfMSConnectionIDChangedNotify"); Session.strEndpointPlusConnectionId = Session.g_cnfMain.name + "#" + Session.g_epMain.connection_id;
Server.logInfo("FAIL TO SEND ConfMSConnectionIDChangedNotify TO CC");
js_enable_event();
Session.g_strReturnMsg = "SUCCESSFUL CHANGE AUDIO MODE";

text-object.text: nToMode: 0 - Speak (off hold, unmute) 1 - Hold 2 - Mute

scripts.script: Server.logError("ERROR: FAIL TO SET SUB CONF TYPE");
js_initTEST(Session.g_oTEST); Session.g_nReturnCode = -50;
Session.g_nTerminationReason = 1;
js_enable_event();
js_enable_event();
Session.oSipMsg.hdr.content = ""; Session.oSipMsg.hdr.content_length = "0";
Server.logError("ERROR: FAIL TO INSERT INTO CONFERENCES RESOURCES");
Server.logInfo(Session._sessionId + " CURRENTLY IN FUNCTION: psAPISceConfInitializer"); Server.logInfo("INFO: *********JAVA CALLING authConfInitializer *********");

results.result: nReturnCode == 0 OR nReturnCode == 1 OR nReturnCode == -12 OR nReturnCode == -14

text-object.text: Should remove the local vars eventually. If java doesn't need them, don't send them
need to change parameter 50 and 51 to global vars g_nLocalGMTOffset

scripts.script: Server.logInfo("*********JAVA RETURN*********"); Server.logInfo("commitAndReserve returned " + Session.nReturnCode);
